Description: You throw a clump of special mud that has the power to remove all stat changes from a target. Make a ranged attack, dealing poison damage on a hit. On a hit, any stat changes affecting the target since the beginning of battle are reset.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
